page.title: 17CRIME AND LAW IN MIDHURST
page.content: Vandalism is the commonest crime in the Midhurst area.An average of 1 car a month is stolen. About 3 traffic accidents a month occur.In the first 5 months of 1985, 23O crimes were reported.There are 8 policemen and no women in Midhurst. They patrol the surrounding areas in patrol cars but in the town more work is done on foot. There are none of the serious crimes such as rape or murder. The Magistrates Court sits in Midhurst on every other Thursday.9 magistrates must sit on a case,split 5:4,male and female.A magistrate must sit at least 26 times a year.The usual sentences given in Midhurst are fines. They do not often sentence offenders to imprisonment. With the help of police, magistrates and others we stage a court scene in school every year.
